CustomField.description: This field will contain the timezone offset from UTC for the user who made/received the call at the time the call was made. The default value for this field is zero until updated by the NCRO trigger Rule (v8.5 onwards)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field will contain the timezone offset From UTC for the user who made/received the call at the time the call was made. The default value for this field is zero until updated by the NCRO trigger Rule (v8.5 onwards)
CustomField.label: Timezone Offset
